text: Journey to the Center of the Earth is a 1959 American science fiction family adventure movie directed by Henry Levin and is based on the 1864 novel of the same name by Jules Verne. It stars James Mason, Pat Boone, Arlene Dahl, Thayer David and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1960. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1950s family movies Category:1959 science fiction movies Category:1950s American adventure movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry Levin Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Iceland Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:1959 adventure movies
title: Journey to the Center of the Earth (1959 movie)
